message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product which I believe would be highly beneficial for you. Considering its value, I'm offering it at a price of $1,100,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,100,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your position, the value this product brings is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,050,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but unfortunately, I cannot exceed my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this proposal is within your considerations.
